atk-abh02a14:3_3: Yasmā pana parato atthe ñāṇaṁ atthapaṭisambhidātiādimāha,
atk-abh02a14:3_6: Iti “catasso paṭisambhidā”ti padena cattāro ñāṇappabhedāti ayamattho saṅgahito.
atk-abh02a14:3_10: Dhammappabhedassa hi sallakkhaṇavibhāvanāvavatthānakaraṇasamatthaṁ dhamme pabhedagataṁ ñāṇaṁ dhammapaṭisambhidā nāma.
atk-abh02a14:3_11: Niruttippabhedassa sallakkhaṇavibhāvanāvavatthānakaraṇasamatthaṁ niruttābhilāpe pabhedagataṁ ñāṇaṁ niruttipaṭisambhidā nāma.
atk-abh02a14:3_12: Paṭibhānappabhedassa sallakkhaṇavibhāvanāvavatthānakaraṇasamatthaṁ paṭibhāne pabhedagataṁ ñāṇaṁ paṭibhānapaṭisambhidā nāma.
atk-abh02a14:4_0: Idāni yathānikkhittā paṭisambhidā bhājetvā dassento atthe ñāṇaṁ atthapaṭisambhidātiādimāha.
atk-abh02a14:4_6: kiriyāti ime pañca dhammā atthoti veditabbā.
atk-abh02a14:4_7: Taṁ atthaṁ paccavekkhantassa tasmiṁ atthe pabhedagataṁ ñāṇaṁ atthapaṭisambhidā.
atk-abh02a14:5_1: So hi yasmā taṁ taṁ vidahati pavatteti ceva pāpeti ca,
atk-abh02a14:5_3: Pabhedato pana yo koci phalanibbattako hetu,
atk-abh02a14:5_5: akusalanti ime pañca dhammā dhammoti veditabbā.
atk-abh02a14:5_6: Taṁ dhammaṁ paccavekkhantassa tasmiṁ dhamme pabhedagataṁ ñāṇaṁ dhammapaṭisambhidā.
atk-abh02a14:6_0: Tatra dhammaniruttābhilāpe ñāṇanti tasmiṁ atthe ca dhamme ca yā sabhāvanirutti,
atk-abh02a14:6_1: tassā abhilāpe taṁ sabhāvaniruttiṁ saddaṁ ārammaṇaṁ katvā paccavekkhantassa tasmiṁ sabhāvaniruttābhilāpe pabhedagataṁ ñāṇaṁ niruttipaṭisambhidā.
atk-abh02a14:6_7: “phassā”ti vā “phassa”nti vā vutte pana “ayaṁ na sabhāvaniruttī”ti jānāti.
atk-abh02a14:6_9: Aññaṁ panesa nāmaākhyātaupasaggabyañjanasaddaṁ jānāti na jānātīti?
atk-abh02a14:6_13: Taṁ pana nayidaṁ paṭisambhidākiccanti paṭikkhipitvā idaṁ vatthu kathitaṁ –
atk-abh02a14:7_0: Tissadattatthero kira bodhimaṇḍe suvaṇṇasalākaṁ gahetvā aṭṭhārasasu bhāsāsu ‘katarabhāsāya kathemī’ti pavāresi.
atk-abh02a14:7_1: Taṁ pana tena attano uggahe ṭhatvā pavāritaṁ,
atk-abh02a14:7_3: So hi mahāpaññatāya taṁ taṁ bhāsaṁ kathāpetvā kathāpetvā uggaṇhi;
atk-abh02a14:8_0: Bhāsaṁ nāma sattā uggaṇhantīti vatvā ca panettha idaṁ kathitaṁ.
atk-abh02a14:8_1: Mātāpitaro hi daharakāle kumārake mañce vā pīṭhe vā nipajjāpetvā taṁ taṁ kathayamānā tāni tāni kiccāni karonti.
atk-abh02a14:8_2: Dārakā tesaṁ taṁ taṁ bhāsaṁ vavatthāpenti –
atk-abh02a14:8_5: Gacchante gacchante kāle sabbampi bhāsaṁ jānanti.
atk-abh02a14:8_8: Tesaṁ jāto dārako sace mātukathaṁ paṭhamaṁ suṇāti,
atk-abh02a14:8_12: Ubhinnampi pana kathaṁ assuṇanto māgadhabhāsaṁ bhāsissati.
atk-abh02a14:9_2: sopi attano dhammatāya vacanaṁ samuṭṭhāpento māgadhabhāsameva bhāsissati. Niraye,
atk-abh02a14:9_7: Tattha sesā oṭṭakirātaandhakayonakadamiḷabhāsādikā aṭṭhārasa bhāsā parivattanti.
atk-abh02a14:9_9: Sammāsabuddhopi tepiṭakaṁ buddhavacanaṁ tantiṁ āropento māgadhabhāsāya eva āropesi. Kasmā?
atk-abh02a14:9_11: Māgadhabhāsāya hi tantiṁ āruḷhassa buddhavacanassa paṭisambhidāppattānaṁ sotapathāgamanameva papañco;
atk-abh02a14:9_12: sote pana saṅghaṭṭitamatteyeva nayasatena nayasahassena attho upaṭṭhāti.
atk-abh02a14:9_13: Aññāya pana bhāsāya tantiṁ āruḷhaṁ pothetvā pothetvā uggahetabbaṁ hoti.
atk-abh02a14:9_14: Bahumpi uggahetvā pana puthujjanassa paṭisambhidāppatti nāma natthi.
atk-abh02a14:10_0: Ñāṇesu ñāṇanti sabbatthakañāṇaṁ ārammaṇaṁ katvā ñāṇaṁ paccavekkhantassa pabhedagataṁ ñāṇaṁ paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāti.
atk-abh02a14:10_1: Imā pana catassopi paṭisambhidā dvīsu ṭhānesu pabhedaṁ gacchanti,
atk-abh02a14:10_5: Tattha sāriputtattherassa mahāmoggallānattherassa mahākassapattherassa mahākaccāyanattherassa mahākoṭṭhitattherassāti
atk-abh02a14:10_6: asītiyāpi mahātherānaṁ paṭisambhidā asekkhabhūmiyaṁ pabhedaṁ gatā.
atk-abh02a14:10_7: Ānandattherassa cittassa gahapatino dhammikassa upāsakassa upālissa gahapatino khujjuttarāya upāsikāyāti
atk-abh02a14:10_8: evamādīnaṁ paṭisambhidā sekkhabhūmiyaṁ pabhedaṁ gatāti imāsu dvīsu bhūmīsu pabhedaṁ gacchanti.
atk-abh02a14:11_0: Katamehi pañcahi kāraṇehi paṭisambhidā visadā hontīti?
atk-abh02a14:11_10: Sakkaccañhi dhammaṁ suṇantassa paṭisambhidā visadā honti.
atk-abh02a14:11_12: Uggahitapāḷiyā atthaṁ kathentassa hi paṭisambhidā visadā honti.
atk-abh02a14:11_16: Tattha arahattappattiyā punabbasukuṭumbikaputtassa tissattherassa paṭisambhidā visadā ahesuṁ.
atk-abh02a14:11_17: So kira tambapaṇṇidīpe buddhavacanaṁ uggaṇhitvā paratīraṁ gantvā yonakadhammarakkhitattherassa santike
atk-abh02a14:11_18: buddhavacanaṁ uggaṇhitvā āgacchanto nāvaṁ abhiruhanatitthe ekasmiṁ pade uppannakaṅkho yojanasatamaggaṁ
atk-abh02a14:11_19: nivattitvā ācariyassa santikaṁ gacchanto antarāmagge ekassa kuṭumbikassa pañhaṁ kathesi.
atk-abh02a14:11_22: Thero vāsiyā koṭṭetvā nisīdanaṭṭhāne paribhaṇḍaṁ kāresi.
atk-abh02a14:11_26: “amhākaṁ gatamaggaṁ āvajjetvā anāgate sabrahmacārino paṭipattiṁ pūretabbaṁ maññissantī”ti.
atk-abh02a14:11_27: Tissattheropi ācariyassa santike kaṅkhaṁ chinditvā jambukolapaṭṭane oruyha cetiyaṅgaṇaṁ sammajjanavelāya vālikavihāraṁ patvā sammajji.
atk-abh02a14:11_28: Tassa sammajjitaṭṭhānaṁ disvā ‘idaṁ vītarāgassa bhikkhuno sammaṭṭhaṭṭhāna’nti therassa vīmaṁsanatthāya pañhaṁ pucchiṁsu.
atk-abh02a14:12_0: Pariyattiyā pana tissadattattherassa ceva nāgasenattherassa ca paṭisambhidā visadā ahesuṁ.
atk-abh02a14:12_2: So kira talaṅgaravāsī dhammadinnattherassa bhāgineyyo khuraggeyeva arahattaṁ patto mātulattherassa dhammavinicchayaṭṭhāne
atk-abh02a14:12_3: nisīditvā suṇantoyeva tīṇi piṭakāni paguṇāni akāsi.
atk-abh02a14:12_4: Uggahitapāḷiyā atthaṁ kathentassa pana tissadattattherassa eva paṭisambhidā visadā ahesuṁ.
atk-abh02a14:12_5: Gatapaccāgatavattaṁ pana pūretvā yāva anulomaṁ kammaṭṭhānaṁ ussukkāpetvā āgatānaṁ visadabhāvappattapaṭisambhidānaṁ pubbayogāvacarānaṁ anto natthi.
atk-abh02a14:13_5: Pariyattisavanaparipucchā hi pubbe hontu vā mā vā,
atk-abh02a14:13_6: pubbayogena pubbe ceva etarahi ca saṅkhārasammasanaṁ vinā paṭisambhidā nāma natthi.
atk-abh02a14:13_7: Ime pana dvepi ekato hutvā paṭisambhidā upatthambhetvā visadā karontīti.
atk-abh02a14:16_1: Idāni ye saṅgahavāre pañca atthā ca dhammā ca saṅgahitā,
atk-abh02a14:16_2: tesaṁ pabhedadassananayena paṭisambhidā vibhajituṁ puna catassotiādinā nayena pabhedavāro āraddho.
atk-abh02a14:16_4: Tattha paccayasamuppannassa dukkhasaccassa paccayena pattabbassa nibbānassa ca atthabhāvaṁ,
atk-abh02a14:16_5: phalanibbattakassa samudayassa nibbānasampāpakassa ariyamaggassa ca dhammabhāvañca dassetuṁ ‘saccavāro’ vutto.
atk-abh02a14:16_6: Yassa kassaci pana hetuphalanibbattakassa hetuno dhammabhāvaṁ,
atk-abh02a14:16_8: Tattha ca hetuphalakkamavasena uppaṭipāṭiyā paṭhamaṁ dhammapaṭisambhidā niddiṭṭhā.
atk-abh02a14:16_9: Ye pana dhammā tamhā tamhā rūpārūpappabhedā hetuto jātā,
atk-abh02a14:16_11: tassa tassa ca rūpārūpadhammappabhedassa hetuno dhammabhāvaṁ dassetuṁ ‘dhammavāro’ vutto.
atk-abh02a14:16_14: Tato pariyattisaṅkhātassa tassa tassa bhāsitassa dhammabhāvaṁ,
atk-abh02a14:16_15: bhāsitasaṅkhātena paccayena pattabbassa bhāsitatthassa ca atthabhāvaṁ dassetuṁ ‘pariyattivāro’ vutto.
atk-abh02a14:17_0: Tattha ca yasmā bhāsitaṁ ñatvā tassattho ñāyati,
atk-abh02a14:17_1: tasmā bhāsitabhāsitatthakkamena uppaṭipāṭiyā paṭhamaṁ dhammapaṭisambhidā niddiṭṭhā.
atk-abh02a14:17_2: Pariyattidhammassa ca pabhedadassanatthaṁ “tattha katamā dhammapaṭisambhidā”ti pucchāpubbaṅgamo paṭiniddesavāro vutto.
atk-abh02a14:17_3: Tattha suttantiādīhi navahi aṅgehi nippadesato tanti gahitā.
atk-abh02a14:17_5: ayaṁ imassa bhāsitassa atthoti imasmimpi ṭhāne bhāsitavasena nippadesato tanti eva gahitāti.
atk-abh02a14:20_3: Sā hi nibbānārammaṇānaṁ maggaphalañāṇānaṁ vasena lokuttarāpi hoti.
atk-abh02a14:20_4: Abhidhammabhājanīye kusalākusalavipākakiriyānaṁ vasena catūhi vārehi vibhattaṁ.
atk-abh02a14:20_5: Tattha yattakāni heṭṭhā cittuppādakaṇḍe kusalacittāni vibhattāni,
atk-abh02a14:20_6: tesaṁ sabbesampi vasena ekekasmiṁ cittaniddese catasso catasso paṭisambhidā vibhattāti veditabbā.
atk-abh02a14:20_10: ekekasmiṁ vipākacitte ca kiriyacitte ca tisso tissova paṭisambhidā vibhattā.
atk-abh02a14:21_0: Kasmā pana yathā kusalākusalavāresu “tesaṁ vipāke ñāṇaṁ atthapaṭisambhidā”ti vuttaṁ,
atk-abh02a14:21_2: tesu ñāṇaṁ dhammapaṭisambhidā”ti evaṁ na vuttanti?
atk-abh02a14:21_5: “tesaṁ vipāke ñāṇaṁ atthapaṭisambhidā”ti heṭṭhā vuttattā ayaṁ atthapaṭisambhidāpi idha na vattabbā siyāti?
atk-abh02a14:21_8: Kiriyavāre ca “yesaṁ dhammānaṁ ime kiriyā”ti vacanameva na yujjatīti dvīsupi imesu vāresu tisso tissova paṭisambhidā vibhattā.
atk-abh02a14:22_0: Tattha yāya niruttiyā tesaṁ dhammānaṁ paññatti hotīti yāya niruttiyā tesaṁ phasso hotītiādinā nayena vuttānaṁ dhammānaṁ “ayaṁ phasso,
atk-abh02a14:22_2: Tattha dhammaniruttābhilāpe ñāṇanti tasmiṁ atthe dhamme ca pavattamānāya tassā dhammaniruttiyā sabhāvapaññattiyā abhilāpe ñāṇaṁ.
atk-abh02a14:22_3: Abhilāpasaddaṁ ārammaṇaṁ katvā uppannañāṇameva idhāpi kathitaṁ.
atk-abh02a14:22_5: Tāniñāṇāni jānātīti itarāni tīṇi paṭisambhidāñāṇāni jānāti.
atk-abh02a14:23_0: Idāni yathā yaṁ ñāṇaṁ tāni ñāṇāni jānāti,
atk-abh02a14:23_1: tathā tassa tesu pavattiṁ dassetuṁ imāni ñāṇāni idamatthajotakānīti vuttaṁ.
atk-abh02a14:23_2: Tattha idamatthajotakānīti imassa atthassa jotakāni pakāsakāni;
atk-abh02a14:23_3: imaṁ nāma atthaṁ jotenti pakāsenti paricchindantīti attho.
atk-abh02a14:23_4: Iti ñāṇesu ñāṇanti iminā ākārena pavattaṁ tīsu ñāṇesu ñāṇaṁ paṭibhānapaṭisambhidā nāma.
atk-abh02a14:24_0: Tattha kiñcāpi ayaṁ paṭibhānapaṭisambhidā ‘imissā idaṁ kiccaṁ,
atk-abh02a14:24_1: imissā idaṁ kicca’nti itarāsaṁ paṭisambhidānaṁ kiccaṁ jānāti,
atk-abh02a14:24_2: sayaṁ pana tāsaṁ kiccaṁ kātuṁ na sakkoti,
atk-abh02a14:24_10: Tesu appassuto gatagataṭṭhāne attano sarasampattiyā sakalaparisaṁ khobhetvā dhammaṁ kathesi.
atk-abh02a14:24_15: ‘dhammasavane jānissatha ayaṁ tipiṭakadharo vā no vā’ti āha.
atk-abh02a14:24_17: yathā pana sakalaparisaṁ khobhetvā dhammaṁ kathetuṁ sakkoti,
atk-abh02a14:24_22: sayaṁ pana taṁ kiccaṁ kātuṁ na sakkotīti veditabbaṁ.
atk-abh02a14:25_1: Evaṁ kusalacittuppādādivasena paṭisambhidā vibhajitvā idāni tāsaṁ uppattiṭṭhānabhūtaṁ khettaṁ dassetuṁ puna catasso paṭisambhidātiādimāha.
atk-abh02a14:25_2: Tattha tisso paṭisambhidā kāmāvacarakusalato catūsu ñāṇasampayuttesu cittuppādesūti idaṁ sekkhānaṁ vasena vuttaṁ.
atk-abh02a14:25_3: Tesañhipi dhammapaccavekkhaṇakāle heṭṭhā vuttaṁ pañcappakāraṁ dhammaṁ ārammaṇaṁ katvā catūsu ñāṇasampayuttakusalacittesu dhammapaṭisambhidā uppajjati.
atk-abh02a14:25_4: Tathā niruttipaccavekkhaṇakāle saddaṁ ārammaṇaṁ katvā niruttipaṭisambhidā;
atk-abh02a14:25_5: ñāṇaṁ paccavekkhaṇakāle sabbatthakañāṇaṁ ārammaṇaṁ katvā paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāti.
atk-abh02a14:26_0: Kiriyato catūsūti idaṁ pana asekkhānaṁ vasena vuttaṁ.
atk-abh02a14:26_1: Tesañhi dhammaṁ paccavekkhaṇakāle heṭṭhā vuttaṁ pañcappakāraṁ dhammaṁ ārammaṇaṁ katvā catūsu ñāṇasampayuttakiriyacittesu dhammapaṭisambhidā uppajjati.
atk-abh02a14:26_2: Tathā niruttipaccavekkhaṇakāle saddaṁ ārammaṇaṁ katvā niruttipaṭisambhidā;
atk-abh02a14:26_3: ñāṇaṁ paccavekkhaṇakāle sabbatthakañāṇaṁ ārammaṇaṁ katvā paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāti.
atk-abh02a14:27_0: Atthapaṭisambhidā etesu ceva uppajjatīti idaṁ pana sekkhāsekkhānaṁ vasena vuttaṁ.
atk-abh02a14:27_1: Tathā hi sekkhānaṁ atthapaccavekkhaṇakāle heṭṭhā vuttappabhedaṁ atthaṁ ārammaṇaṁ katvā catūsu ñāṇasampayuttakusalacittesu ayaṁ uppajjati,
atk-abh02a14:27_3: Asekkhassa pana atthaṁ paccavekkhaṇakāle heṭṭhā vuttappabhedameva atthaṁ ārammaṇaṁ katvā catūsu ñāṇasampayuttakiriyacittesu uppajjati,
atk-abh02a14:27_5: Evametā sekkhāsekkhānaṁ uppajjamānā imāsu bhūmīsu uppajjantīti bhūmidassanatthaṁ ayaṁ nayo dassitoti.
atk-abh02a14:30_1: Pañhāpucchake pāḷianusāreneva catunnaṁ paṭisambhidānaṁ kusalādibhāvo veditabbo.
atk-abh02a14:30_2: Ārammaṇattikesu pana niruttipaṭisambhidā saddameva ārammaṇaṁ karotīti parittārammaṇā.
atk-abh02a14:30_3: Atthapaṭisambhidā kāmāvacaravipākakiriyasaṅkhātañceva paccayasamuppannañca atthaṁ paccavekkhantassa parittārammaṇā;
atk-abh02a14:30_6: Dhammapaṭisambhidā kāmāvacaraṁ kusaladhammaṁ akusaladhammaṁ paccayadhammañca paccavekkhantassa parittārammaṇā;
atk-abh02a14:30_7: rūpāvacarārūpāvacaraṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayadhammañca paccavekkhantassa mahaggatārammaṇā ;
atk-abh02a14:30_8: lokuttaraṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayadhammañca paccavekkhantassa appamāṇārammaṇā.
atk-abh02a14:30_10: rūpāvacarārūpāvacarāni kusalavipākakiriyañāṇāni paccavekkhantassa tesaṁ ārammaṇāni vijānantassa mahaggatārammaṇā;
atk-abh02a14:31_5: maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhantassa ārammaṇādhipativasena maggādhipati.
atk-abh02a14:31_9: Niruttipaṭisambhidā paccuppannameva saddaṁ ārammaṇaṁ karotīti paccuppannārammaṇā.
atk-abh02a14:32_0: Atthapaṭisambhidā atītaṁ vipākatthaṁ kiriyatthaṁ paccayasamuppannañca paccavekkhantassa atītārammaṇā,
atk-abh02a14:32_4: Dhammapaṭisambhidā atītaṁ kusalaṁ akusalaṁ paccayadhammañca paccavekkhantassa atītārammaṇā,
atk-abh02a14:32_7: Paṭibhānapaṭisambhidā atītaṁ kusalañāṇaṁ vipākañāṇaṁ kiriyañāṇañca paccavekkhantassa atītārammaṇā,
atk-abh02a14:33_1: Itarāsu tīsu atthapaṭisambhidā ajjhattaṁ vipākatthaṁ kiriyatthaṁ paccayasamuppannañca paccavekkhantassa ajjhattārammaṇā,
atk-abh02a14:33_5: Dhammapaṭisambhidā ajjhattaṁ kusalākusalaṁ paccayadhammaṁ paccavekkhaṇakāle ajjhattārammaṇā,
atk-abh02a14:34_2: Imasmiñhi paṭisambhidāvibhaṅge sammāsambuddhena tayopi nayā lokiyalokuttaramissakattā ekaparicchedāva kathitā.
atk-abh02a14:34_3: Tīsupi hi etāsu tisso paṭisambhidā lokiyā,
atk-abh02a14:34_5: Evamayaṁ paṭisambhidāvibhaṅgopi teparivaṭṭaṁ nīharitvāva bhājetvā dassitoti.
